titleStmt.title: To the reverend and merry answerer of Vox cleri To be left at Mr. Brabazon Aylmer's at the Three Pigeons in Cornhill. With a bundle.

notesStmt.note: Wing lists this as a Thomason tract. However, Thomason stopped collecting items in 1661 and he died in 1666.
A reply to: Payne, William. An answer to Vox Cleri, &c. (Wing p896), itself an answer to: Long, Thomas, Vox Cleri (Wing L2986), published in 1690.
Reproduction of original in the Newberry Library.
